title: Affion Crockett
description:
In celebration of the recent "Martin" TV show reunion special on BET+, we're looking back at the time Kevin Hart sat down with actor, writer and comedian Affion Crocket. The two discuss his career along with an 18 year long running staredown bit between Affion and Kevin that always gets a reaction.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Affion Crockett)
